comment:
* Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an action is
     * performed on the editor.

methods.name: boolean onEditorAction(TextView v, int actionId, KeyEvent event)
methods.comment:
* Called when an action is being performed.
         *
         * @param v The view that was clicked.
         * @param actionId Identifier of the action.  This will be either the
         * identifier you supplied, or {@link EditorInfo#IME_NULL
         * EditorInfo.IME_NULL} if being called due to the enter key
         * being pressed. Starting from Android 14, the action identifier will
         * also be included when triggered by an enter key if the input is
         * constrained to a single line.
         * @param event If triggered by an enter key, this is the event;
         * otherwise, this is null.
         * @return Return true if you have consumed the action, else false.

methodNames: boolean onEditorAction(TextView v, int actionId, KeyEvent event)
